review_description: Sadly, we cannot take any action against these scamming companies. When we pay for a package, it should be activated until the end of the subscription. They made all recurrent packages, so they can take as much money as they can get from us. If we are cancelling it earlier, they remove what we paid for as well as take our rights to use it. So can we expect a clean Sri Lanka with dirty dogs like these inside government owned companies?
translated_review: Sadly, we cannot take any action against these scamming companies. When we pay for a package, it should be activated until the end of the subscription. They made all recurrent packages, so they can take as much money as they can get from us. If we are cancelling it earlier, they remove what we paid for as well as take our rights to use it. So can we expect a clean Sri Lanka with dirty dogs like these inside government owned companies?

review_description: I've been trying to update my email on the MySLT app for nearly two months, and every time I get the same message: "Service temporarily unavailable." It's beyond frustrating. On top of that, I no longer receive my monthly bill via email, which makes things even more inconvenient. This is a basic feature that should work properly, and it's disappointing that SLT hasn't fixed it after all this time. Please prioritize your users and sort these issues out.
translated_review: I've been trying to update my email on the MySLT app for nearly two months, and every time I get the same message: "Service temporarily unavailable." It's beyond frustrating. On top of that, I no longer receive my monthly bill via email, which makes things even more inconvenient. This is a basic feature that should work properly, and it's disappointing that SLT hasn't fixed it after all this time. Please prioritize your users and sort these issues out.

review_description: I was thrilled to hear about an all-in -one app from SLT. Started using it last year. Until today the app is very stale. No new features. Basic feature expected is not there, like billing details. At minimum the bill details of last three months should be visible in the app (not the bill amount only) because the e-bill service is also a hit and miss affair. Once in a while the bill does not come (I am competent enough to locate the bill if it arrives in to the mail service).
translated_review: I was thrilled to hear about an all-in -one app from SLT. Started using it last year. Until today the app is very stale. No new features. Basic feature expected is not there, like billing details. At minimum the bill details of last three months should be visible in the app (not the bill amount only) because the e-bill service is also a hit and miss affair. Once in a while the bill does not come (I am competent enough to locate the bill if it arrives in to the mail service).

review_description: I would like to report a BUG in the "Broadband" log in flow of MySLT app. According to "1212 officers" i should be able to use the same credentials as "SLT Broadband" app. But each time i tried it says "Invalid user name or password". Tried to explain the scenario to the "1212 officer" and she was resetting my password over and over. 🙄🙄🤦‍♀️ Then i sent an email to 1212; they also has done a password reset and shared me the password. At least hope this account is managed by the Dev team??
developer_response: We apologize for the inconvenience. Can you be more specific please so that we can identify the issue? Don't hesitate to reach out to us at https://www.slt.lk.
translated_review: I would like to report a BUG in the "Broadband" log in flow of MySLT app. According to "1212 officers" i should be able to use the same credentials as "SLT Broadband" app. But each time i tried it says "Invalid user name or password". Tried to explain the scenario to the "1212 officer" and she was resetting my password over and over. 🙄🙄🤦‍♀️ Then i sent an email to 1212; they also has done a password reset and shared me the password. At least hope this account is managed by the Dev team??

review_description: As i wanted to pay my SLT telephone bills from home via online, I installed this MySLT App last week. Since then i am trying many times to sign in to the App which is made necessary, but to my dismay i was unable to do it due to faults of this App. Every time i try it and enter the required OTP number which is sent to my email, your message shows that it is wrong! Sometimes your message say that service is temporarily unavailable. How can i get your service & pay my bills? I am disappointed.
developer_response:
Hi,
Sorry about the inconvenience. Try clearing the cache or reinstalling the app. In case the issue still persists, kindly send the error screenshot to https://www.slt.lk along with the contact details so that we check this.
translated_review: As i wanted to pay my SLT telephone bills from home via online, I installed this MySLT App last week. Since then i am trying many times to sign in to the App which is made necessary, but to my dismay i was unable to do it due to faults of this App. Every time i try it and enter the required OTP number which is sent to my email, your message shows that it is wrong! Sometimes your message say that service is temporarily unavailable. How can i get your service & pay my bills? I am disappointed.

review_description: It's good to have an app but the issue with this application is that you have to contact the service team to get your account set up where as you cant register by yourself and use it which makes it a bit useless. Please check on this and fix it appropriately so that it will be easy for users to check there connection status which also will minimize the call which we take just to set up an application.
developer_response: We regret the inconvenience; our team is constantly working on supporting many more use cases and devices. We will surely get back to you once we have an update.
translated_review: It's good to have an app but the issue with this application is that you have to contact the service team to get your account set up where as you cant register by yourself and use it which makes it a bit useless. Please check on this and fix it appropriately so that it will be easy for users to check there connection status which also will minimize the call which we take just to set up an application.

review_description: Even though, the app is good but the bill payment did not work for me. However your idea is good, but consider about the user friendly things. Please make a better single app for SLT phone and broadband and also bill payment and data information, rather than multiple apps. As a leading company in Sri Lanka you can do it.
translated_review: Even though, the app is good but the bill payment did not work for me. However your idea is good, but consider about the user friendly things. Please make a better single app for SLT phone and broadband and also bill payment and data information, rather than multiple apps. As a leading company in Sri Lanka you can do it.

review_description: කිසි තේරැමක් නෑ අපරාදෙ මේ app එකට යන ඉඩ. අන්තිම Bill එකයි අන්තිම ගෙවීමයි විතරයි බලන්න පුලුවන්. අඩුම ගානෙ Call ආගිය විස්තර call Charges වත් බලන්න බෑ. මේවගේ app එකකට බැටරිය වෙන් කරන එකත් අපරාදෙ ඔයාල IT Section එකේ උනාට කිසි තේරැමක් නැ. ඒ අතින් CEB Salfcare app එක මාර සාර්තකයි. එයාල දිහා බලල වත් හරවත් දෙයක් කරන්න එකින් එකට app relese කරන් නැතිව. App හදල userla ගානට සල්ලි නොසොය. CEB app එක ඔයාලයි කරමේටකරානම් මෙවද්දි bill payment app එකයි bill calculator app එකයි. Electricity Account කියල එකයි එවයි..
translated_review: කිසි තේරැමක් නෑ අපරාදෙ මේ app එකට යන ඉඩ. අන්තිම Bill එකයි අන්තිම ගෙවීමයි විතරයි බලන්න පුලුවන්. අඩුම ගානෙ Call ආගිය විස්තර call Charges වත් බලන්න බෑ. මේවගේ app එකකට බැටරිය වෙන් කරන එකත් අපරාදෙ ඔයාල IT Section එකේ උනාට කිසි තේරැමක් නැ. ඒ අතින් CEB Salfcare app එක මාර සාර්තකයි. එයාල දිහා බලල වත් හරවත් දෙයක් කරන්න එකින් එකට app relese කරන් නැතිව. App හදල userla ගානට සල්ලි නොසොය. CEB app එක ඔයාලයි කරමේටකරානම් මෙවද්දි bill payment app එකයි bill calculator app එකයි. Electricity Account කියල එකයි එවයි..
